incipit: The Angel Gabriel was sent to Mary, a Virgin espoused to Joseph, to bring unto her the word of the Lord: and when the Virgin saw the light she was afraid. Fear not, Mary, for thou hast found grace from the Lord.
responsum: Behold, thou shalt conceive and bring forth a son, and He shall be called the Son of the Highest.
versus: The Lord God shall give unto Him the throne of His father David, and He shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever.

incipit: Hail, Mary, full of grace; the Lord is with thee:
responsum: The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that Holy Thing Which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.
versus: How shall this be, seeing I know not a man? And the Angel answered and said unto her.
